title: When you hear the word 'life' what is the first thing that comes to your mind? - Quora

response.answer_text: "Have asked lots of people, What does life mean to you?, Some I thought were fake, But for some I felt that they were true. Some said, to play it, a game, for some, the question was lame. Oxford says- its a state of being alive, But to know the actual meaning you need to go in deep and dive. Some think life is living for around 100 years, And for some just a moment which lasts till eternity. It is when the shackles of bondage are broken, Looks like to heaven you have found the token. Life is a journey with an unknown destination, It might be to attain ultimate salvation. My life was a bit different from the others, Thinking of my past, I go into a trance, To re-live it, I want another chance. Just have an experience of 21 years of life, But seen the deepest trenches and highest peaks, Sometimes myself did I vandalize, And opposite to which did I fantasize. Lived different roles in a very short time, Some unimportant and some quite prime. Now, it seems like I have ended a phase, For the people around me, I have lost the craze. Do not know what to do in the future, Heard from many that I still need a lot to mature. Every person who was present in any point of your life deserves a thanks, Either loved me or hated me, Will be, in my life like a golf tee."

Hmmm, There are so many things being played in my mind now. For me, life is wonderful, amazing, interesting and beautiful. However, life can be twisted, bad, and painful. Does that makes sense? Life is about looking for opportunities. Life is about fulfilling curiousity. Life is about learning new things. Life is about being kind to other people. Life is about helping each other. Life is about communicating towards one another. Life is about bring new to their family or new to the society. Life is about achieving success or accomplish something amazing. Life is also about failure and sadness. Life is about up and down too. Life is about the way we perceived love. Life itself is a beautiful thing. It depends on you to view the world.

I brought tools first album undertow years ago , one day I left it playing and a long time after the last song had played there was a sort of chanting “This is necessary, this is necessary, life feeds on life feeds on , this is necessary this is necessary, life feeds on life feeds on….” Accompanied by eerie music and sound , all sorts of out of it shit… I never forgot it. It’s the sound I hear when I think of the mindset of a serial killer,so dark and bleak and to be quite frank It both scared and fascinated me.

Simple, death. It will provide the answer to what most of humanity has pondered over for centuries and we will get to know which religion was right (if any). Also, at one point in their life most people have wondered what the meaning to life was and death seems to provide the answer. Personally, I’m no rush, but at the same time I can’t wait.
JEHOVAH, since He is the source of “life.” [Psalm 36:9]-N.W.T.
Death. It gives life an increased flavour and immediacy.
